list.name: Changes
list.comment:
refactor: apply DTO pattern to Product and Order modules
- Refactored Product, Order, and OrderItem modules to use DTOs (Request/Response). - Removed Domain Entity leakage in API responses for better encapsulation. - Optimized Repository layer using `RETURNING *` and `QueryRowAndScan` for atomic operations. - Implemented Slug generation helper in Service layer. - Standardized Service-to-DTO mapping logic.
Modules affected: Product, Order, OrderItem

project.component: { "keyToString": { "DefaultGoTemplateProperty": "Go File", "Go Build.go build main.go.executor": "Run", "Go Test.TestCreateOrder_InvalidInput in go-ecommerce-service/test/controller.executor": "Run", "Go Test.TestCreateOrder_Success in go-ecommerce-service/test/controller.executor": "Run", "Go Test.TestCreateOrder_ValidationError in go-ecommerce-service/test/controller.executor": "Run", "Go Test.TestGetOrderById_InvalidID in go-ecommerce-service/test/controller.executor": "Run", "Go Test.TestGetOrderById_Success in go-ecommerce-service/test/controller.executor": "Run", "Go Test.TestGetOrdersByUserId_Success in go-ecommerce-service/test/controller.executor": "Run", "Go Test.TestOrderControllerTestSuite in go-ecommerce-service/test/controller.executor": "Debug", "Go Test.go test go-ecommerce-service/test/controller.executor": "Run", "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "RunOnceActivity.GoLinterPluginOnboarding": "true", "RunOnceActivity.GoLinterPluginStorageMigration": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.TerminalTabsStorage.copyFrom.TerminalArrangementManager.252": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "RunOnceActivity.go.formatter.settings.were.checked": "true", "RunOnceActivity.go.migrated.go.modules.settings": "true", "RunOnceActivity.go.modules.go.list.on.any.changes.was.set": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "go.import.settings.migrated": "true", "go.sdk.automatically.set": "true", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/Hasan Can", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm" } }

MESSAGE.value:
feat(tests): complete comprehensive controller test suite
✅ Implement full controller test coverage for all modules ✅ Auth, Product, Order, Cart, CartItem, OrderItem controllers ✅ Comprehensive test scenarios including success/error cases ✅ Mock-based unit testing with proper service isolation ✅ Validation error handling and edge case coverage ✅ 100% test pass rate with enterprise-level quality standards

feat: add categories and stores tables with extended product management
- Add categories and stores tables - Extend products table with new fields (slug, description, base_price, etc.) - Update product repository with new CRUD operations - Add store and category management - Fix null pointer exceptions in scanners - Improve validation and error handling

refactor: standardize API response structure in BaseController
- Introduced generic `ApiResponse` struct (success, message, data). - Refactored `BaseController` methods (Success, Created, BadRequest) to use the new wrapper. - Updated `Created` method to return the created entity with 201 status instead of NoContent. - Standardized error handling to return consistent JSON format.

refactor(domain): add json tags to structs for camelCase serialization
- Added `json:"..."` tags to domain structs (Product, Category, etc.). - Standardized API response fields to camelCase to match frontend models. - Removed the need for manual property mapping on the client side.
fix(controller): update request struct tags to camelCase for correct binding

refactor: implement DTO pattern and optimize repository layer
- Introduced DTO pattern (Request/Response) for Category, Store, Cart, and CartItem modules. - Decoupled Domain Entities from API responses to ensure data encapsulation and security. - Updated Repository layer to use PostgreSQL `RETURNING *` clause with `QueryRowAndScan` for atomic Create/Update operations. - Refactored Service layer to handle DTO-to-Domain mapping. - Standardized Controller responses and fixed routing conflicts (Query Params usage).
Modules affected: Category, Store, Cart, CartItem

refactor: apply DTO pattern to Product and Order modules
- Refactored Product, Order, and OrderItem modules to use DTOs (Request/Response). - Removed Domain Entity leakage in API responses for better encapsulation. - Optimized Repository layer using `RETURNING *` and `QueryRowAndScan` for atomic operations. - Implemented Slug generation helper in Service layer. - Standardized Service-to-DTO mapping logic.
Modules affected: Product, Order, OrderItem
